section: The business name of the Venture will be BM&V2GO, however the partnership name will be Vaccines2Go.
explanation: The contract states that the business name of the venture is BM&V2GO, but then states the partnership name will be Vaccines2Go. The use of two different names for the same entity creates confusion and ambiguity.

section: Duties of Members Description BorrowMoney.com, inc *HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements including a database for medical dispatch personal & product service as needed, including activity information, data storage and backup. provided by three qualified assigned Borrowmoney.com, inc. employees/personal JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue From Awarded Contract, In Addition to The Total Contributions.
explanation: This section mixes descriptions of duties with payment amounts, creating a structural flaw. The information is not presented in a clear or organized manner, making it difficult to understand the exact obligations of each member.

section: Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc 1, 500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty* $3,500.00 USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: There is a huge discrepancy in the agreed value of each contribution. BorrowMoney.com contributes leased office space valued at $3,500.00 while JVLS, LLC contributes an unknown sum valued at $3,500,000.00. The numbers are not logical or properly explained, creating a contradiction.
